        public static void formatXmlFile(java.io.File xmlConfiguration,
                 java.io.File newXmlConfiguration,
                 boolean replace,
                 java.lang.String identationSymbol)
                          throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                 java.io.IOException,
                                 java.lang.Exception
        Utility method to format a xml file
        Parameters:
        xmlConfiguration - The xml configuration file
        newXmlConfiguration - The new xml configuration file
        replace - If the old xml file must be replaced
        identationSymbol - Example: (1) For tab: "\t", (2) Space: " "
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - The exception that will be launched
        java.io.IOException - The exception that will be launched
        java.lang.Exception - The exception that will be launched
